according to the U.S.Code 2252 in section 1151 under this tittle,people who knowingly accesses one or more material that  containing a sexual explict picture of a children under the age of 12 shall be fined and sentence to a prison not less than 5 years and not more than 20 years or both.
What happens after the sex scene ???

Hentai logic 101: You thought it would make sense, but it was I - the obligatory sex scene! You expected character development? It was only to push for a sex scene! You expected common sense or good parenting? The sex scene comes first! Any questions?

Front page says this is the artist's first Comic LO work. For a first work, it's... decent. Characterization is weak and nothing about the writing stands out as being especially entertaining or unique. Other LO writers like Noise and Satuyo have much stronger grasp on creating interesting characters and engaging situations, so being in the same magazine as other strong talents such as them doesn't help them stand out. Hoping their future works are better.
This isn't even hentai logic, it's just lazy writing.
